00049 class b3GpuParallelLinearBvh
00050 {
00051         cl_command_queue m_queue;
00052         
00053         cl_program m_parallelLinearBvhProgram;
00054         
00055         cl_kernel m_separateAabbsKernel;
00056         cl_kernel m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel;
00057         cl_kernel m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel;
00058         
00059         //Binary radix tree construction kernels
00060         cl_kernel m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel;
00061         cl_kernel m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel;
00062         cl_kernel m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel;
00063         cl_kernel m_findDistanceFromRootKernel;
00064         cl_kernel m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel;
00065         
00066         cl_kernel m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel;
00067         
00068         //Traversal kernels
00069         cl_kernel m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel;
00070         cl_kernel m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel;
00071         cl_kernel m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel;
00072         cl_kernel m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel;
00073         
00074         b3RadixSort32CL m_radixSorter;
00075         
00076         //1 element
00077         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_rootNodeIndex;                                                     //Most significant bit(0x80000000) is set to indicate internal node
00078         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_maxDistanceFromRoot;                                       //Max number of internal nodes between an internal node and the root node
00079         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_temp;                                                                      //Used to hold the number of pairs in calculateOverlappingPairs()
00080         
00081         //1 element per internal node (number_of_internal_nodes == number_of_leaves - 1)
00082         b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb> m_internalNodeAabbs;
00083         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int2> m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges;            //x == min leaf index, y == max leaf index
00084         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int2> m_internalNodeChildNodes;                         //x == left child, y == right child; msb(0x80000000) is set to indicate internal node
00085         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_internalNodeParentNodes;                           //For parent node index, msb(0x80000000) is not set since it is always internal
00086         
00087         //1 element per internal node; for binary radix tree construction
00088         b3OpenCLArray<b3Int64> m_commonPrefixes;
00089         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_commonPrefixLengths;
00090         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_distanceFromRoot;                                          //Number of internal nodes between this node and the root
00091         
00092         //1 element per leaf node (leaf nodes only include small AABBs)
00093         b3OpenCLArray<int> m_leafNodeParentNodes;                                       //For parent node index, msb(0x80000000) is not set since it is always internal
00094         b3OpenCLArray<b3SortData> m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies;         //m_key == morton code, m_value == aabb index in m_leafNodeAabbs
00095         b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb> m_mergedAabb;                                          //m_mergedAabb[0] contains the merged AABB of all leaf nodes
00096         b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb> m_leafNodeAabbs;                                       //Contains only small AABBs
00097         
00098         //1 element per large AABB, which is not stored in the BVH
00099         b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb> m_largeAabbs;
00100

00107                                 const b3OpenCLArray<int>& largeAabbIndices);
